name: @tpmjs/tools-text-chunk
description: Split text into chunks by size or sentence boundaries with optional overlap

tools.name: textChunkTool
tools.description: Split text into chunks by size or sentence boundaries with optional overlap

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to split into chunks

parameters.name: maxChunkSize
parameters.description: Maximum size of each chunk in characters

parameters.name: overlap
parameters.description: Number of characters to overlap between chunks (optional, default: 0)

returns.description: Object with chunks array, chunkCount, and totalLength
